title.value: Влияние иммуномодулирующего комплекса биологически активных веществ на продуктивность, резистентность и сохранность телят
Influence of an immunomodulatory complex of biologically active substances on productivity, resistance and safety of calves

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Agrarian Series

person.name: Trofimov, A.F., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)
Shejgratsova, L.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: Modern intensive technologies of feed preservation, quality of feeds and feeding technologies often lead to permanent deficit of biologically active substances in animals' organisms declining in its turn quality of meat and milk products. Percentage of young animals with low viability is rather high because of poor immunity causing high level of morbidity, toxicoses, metabolic disorders and growth retardation. Therefore, creation of biologically active substances, influencing immunity increase and activating growth and development of young agricultural animals (calves) appears an important scientific problem. The main goal of the research, presented in the article, appears increment of efficiency of calves' growing during early stages of postnatal period due to application of immune-modulating complex of biologically active substances. The paper presents the results of research on the use of biologically active substances in the diet of calves of early postnatal ontogenesis. It is found that additional feeding with immune-modulatory complex (KVMD and
) promotes energy growth of calves, humoral factors of protection and immunological reactivity.
